title: UH Centre for Astrophysics Research PATT-linked grant
abstractText: This award is requested to cover continuing travel to ground-based telescopes in order to complete competitively-awarded programmes of observation, by astronomers based in the Centre for Astrophysics Research, at the University of Hertfordshire.
impactText: This is a small observing travel/subsistence grant servicing astronomers carrying out research at the University of Hertfordshire. Too soon to report. Culture, Heritage, Museums and Collections Cultural
